title: Kim Kardashian willing to 'pee her pants and have sister wipe her leg' for Met Gala look
text:

Kim Kardashian had a not very glamorous plan of action if she needed to urinate at the Met Gala , that took place in May this year.

The curvy star, 28, who modelled a custom made corset and silicone dress by Thierry Mugler for the event, has divulged her cunning plan if nature called during whilst wearing the ensemble in teaser clip for an upcoming episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

In the footage released ahead of the show airing, Kim can be seen getting ready for the invite-only event where she discusses what she will do if she needs to use the toilet - as she cannot strip out of her restrictive bodysuit.

Talking to pal Jonathan Cheban and two female friends, Kim shares: "If I have to pee, it's a problem.

"Honestly, if it's an emergency, I think I pee my pants and then have my sister wipe my leg up," she added

(Image: Getty Images)

"I'm not even joking. She can wipe my leg up."

Kim's sisters Kylie and Kendall were invited to the party - so it would have been one of them given the intimate task.

Kim's 2019 outfit this year was soaked with diamond droplets, inspired by Raquel Welch by the sea for the Camp: Notes on Fashion theme.

(Image: E!)

(Image: E!)

The corset part of the outfit, designed by French corsetier Mr Pearl, was custom made with clear straps and a nude body so that it sat perfectly under her gown, and included built in Spanx which went down to her knees.

Mr Pearl is an iconic corset maker, originally from South Africa, who began his career working with Thierry Mugler in New York in 1989.

(Image: Vogue)

Kim was the first to admit that she suffered to achieve the look, even revealing that she wouldn't be able to it all evening as a consequence.

It also took three grown men to tie up the boned bodysuit that made her waist appear tiny and seven months for the garment to be designed and finished.
